amendment.description: An amendment numbered 23 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to reduce funding for the National Endowment for the Humanities to FY2019 levels.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for the National Endowment for the Humanities by $48,895,000 and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 147 - 269 (Roll no. 386).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 147 - 269 (Roll no. 386).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
